alert.note: Alert for Northern Arctic Coast (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued August 27 at 6:36AM AKDT until August 28 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM AKDT MONDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves will wash surf to the top of the beach. * WHERE...Northern Arctic Coast. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Monday. * IMPACTS...Localized beach erosion will occur. Items left on the beach will wash away. Debris will wash onto beaches. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Winds will turn northwest tonight and gust to 35 mph. These winds will push waves to the top of the beach causing erosion and washing away items left on the beach. Winds and waves will decrease Monday morning. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Precautions should be taken to protect property. &&
